Apple Black Rot.suggestions: Prune out dead or diseased branches, remove mummified fruits, and practice good sanitation.
Apple Black Rot.remedies: Use fungicides such as thiophanate-methyl during the growing season.

Apple Healthy.suggestions: Continue regular maintenance and monitor for pests or diseases.
Apple Healthy.remedies: No remedies needed; keep up with watering, pruning, and fertilization.

Apple Rust.suggestions: Remove nearby junipers, prune out galls, and plant resistant apple varieties.
Apple Rust.remedies: Apply fungicides like myclobutanil during the infection period.

Apple Scab.suggestions: Plant resistant varieties, ensure good air circulation, and remove and destroy fallen leaves.
Apple Scab.remedies: Apply fungicides like captan or mancozeb at the first sign of disease.
